channel.title: Help please, probolem loading clients
channel.description:
Hi help please when i try to load most clients i get this in the cmd
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)[/code]
Some clients work but most dont please help me :)

item.title: Help please, probolem loading clients
item.dc:creator: @VIRUS_7111 VIRUS 7111
item.description:
@VIRUS_7111 wrote:

What can i do to solve it then please? Thanks for help btw

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, probolem loading clients
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“rofllewisrofl, post:2, topic:269697”]It seems to me that It would be server-sided… but…

Since you said Its you’re client CMD… Ill go through these likely things

  1. You’re java isnt up-to-date

  2. You’re RAM isnt high enough

  3. You’re doing something wrong (most likely)[/quote]
    Please dont post if you dont know what your talking about.

  4. is the most pathetic thing ever

[quote=“m.dog311, post:4, topic:268623”]People need to start reading their errors/exceptions before they come here.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: GUI

Put the bold together and what do you get?

No class found: GUI. Basically it is telling you the GUI class isn’t found. Also, the client class has a ‘main’ method in it also ;)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@VIRUS_7111 wrote:

I have 2g RAM
Java 1.6.0_10
And what could i be doing wrong??

It seems to me that It would be server-sided… but…

Since you said Its you’re client CMD… Ill go through these likely things
